name: There's No I In Rhythm
description:
Beating enemies to the beat is no fun as a solo performance. Orchestrate a quartet of heroes and harmoniously defeat the  incoming onslaught of enemies! For the "Let's Jam Together!" game jam.

Starting Controls: (Can be customized)

  • Juniper: A
  • Gunther: D
  • Diana: G
  • Angus: J

Use arrow keys to move cursor, ESC to go back, Enter to enter.

Diversifiers:

  • Language Independence
  • Customization

Created by:

  • Alex - Programming
  • Jawdat - Music
  • Ronan - Art
  • Stefan - Moral support, names
